alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 9:50PM CDT until June 13 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Central McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 950 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just northwest of Idabel, or 24 miles north of Clarksville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... De Queen, Horatio, Idabel, Broken Bow, Lockesburg, Gillham, Millerton, Garvin, Eagletown, Cerrogordo, Geneva, Goodwater, Holly Creek, West Line, Oak Hill, Golden and West Otis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
